div.head: Schedule of Defendant.
div.p: The Schedule whereto the Defendants Answer referrs

25 Novembris
x Jambe 2d:}
Imprimis One Indenture Tripartite of that date made Between Elianor Ashfeild of the first part Richard
Glanville of the second part and Edward Gorges and William Rogers of the third part (reciting two Indentures
of Lease and release bearing date the twenty third and twenty fourth of that instant November made by
the said Elianor Ashfeild to the said Edward Gorges and William Rogers of all her Mannors Lands
and hereditaments in the County of Somersett And reciting a marriage intended to be had Between
the said Richard Glanville and Elianor Ashfeild being a Deed declaring the Trusts on which the
they recited Indentures were made
February 1686}
Item One Indenture of that date made Between the said Richard Glanville and Elianor his wife
Edward Gorges and William Rogers of the one part and Sir Dudley North Knight of the other parte purporting
the Counterpart of an Addicionall Security to Sir Dudley North and Lady Anne his wife for three hundred
pounds and Interest.
9 December 1693}
Item One Indenture of that date made Between Elianor Glanville then wife of the said Richard
Glanville and the said Edward Gorges and William Rogers of the one part and Sir William Merrick Knight
of the other part purporting the Counterpart of an Addicionall Security to Sir William Merrick for Twelve
hundred and Fifty pounds and Interest.
3 September 1694}
Item One Indenture Tripartite of that date made between the same Partys purporting to the Counterpart of
a Security to Sir William Merrick for one thousand Four hundred and fifty pounds and Interest.
12 January 1696}
One Indenture Tripartite of that date made Between the same partys purporting the Counterparts
of Security to Sir William Merrick for one then said Seaven hundred pounds and Interest
25 January 1698}
Item one other Indenture of that date purporting the Counterpart of a mortgage of Backwell Parke
for securing Eight hundred pounds and Interest
19 September 1704
Item one Indenture Tripartite of that date made Between the said Elianor Glanville of the first part
Edward Gorges and William Rogers of the second part and John Shipton of the third part purporting
the Counterpart of a Lease to John Shipton of certain Lands at Tickenham To hold for three years
and afterwards for four years if he and the said Elianor did agree at and under the yearly rend of
forty six pounds.
